title: Add to Cart: These cozy candles will get you in the autumn spirit
text:
Our editorial team is dedicated to finding and telling you more about the products and deals we love. If you love them too and decide to purchase through the links below, we may receive a commission.

Add to Cart features must-have products for every occasion: from suitcases to affordable tech to eco-friendly gifts, we've got you covered.

It can be hard to find the perfect fall candle – but don't worry, we've got you covered! We tried 5 of the most popular fall candles on the market (at a variety of price points) to help you find the *one.* Watch the video above to see our favorite candles in action and keep scrolling to shop them!

If you love spices, vanilla and a little bit of citrus, then you will love Homesick's take on a pumpkin scent. This soy candle promises 60 to 80 hours of burn time, and its sleek and minimal packing will blend in with any room you like.

View photos

While on the pricier side, this candle from NEST is like an upgraded PSL. It's rich, decadent and, TBH, it smells luxuriously expensive. Notes of spicy masala chai blend perfectly with pumpkin and sweet cinnamon to make this one of our favorite fall candles.

View photos

Those that love more "woodsy" scents will be obsessed with the musky yet clean scent of this Amber & Moss candle. Hand poured and layered with hints of lavender and sage, you'll love this candle long after the fall ends.
description: We tried 5 of the most popular fall candles on the market right now to help you find the *one.*
